Value.label: Alarm Duration Time
Value.Help: If this parameter is set to 0, the beep and LED will be turn on always until water leakage is not detected.

Value.label: Alarm Interval
Value.Help: This Parameter defines beep on/off interval time when water leakage is detected.

Value.label: First Alarm On Time Duration
Value.Help: This parameter defines beep on duration first time when water leakage is detected.

Value.label: Alarm on Time Duration
Value.Help: This parameter defines beep on duration after fist beep on when water leakage is detected.

Value.label: Alarm sound
Value.Help: This parameter defines beep on is enabled or disabled when water leakage is detected. 0 indicate beep on is disable, but LED will be turned on when water leakage detected. 1 indicate beep on is enabled, the BEEP and LED will be turned on when water leakage detected.

Value.label: Water Leakage Detected Report
Value.Help: This parameter defines the function than water leakage detect is enabled or disabled. 0 indicate disable water leakage detect, 1 indicate enable water leakage detect.

Value.label: Basic Set Level
Value.Help: Basic Set Command will be sent where contains a value when the leakage is detected, the receiver will take it for consideration; for instance, if a lamp module is received the Basic Set Command of which value is decisive as to how bright of dim level of lamp module shall be.
